input: The Constituent Assembly of India convened to prepare the Constitution of India appointed a sub-committee headed by Gopinath Bordoloi. Which of the following recommendations was/were made by the committee? P. Fifth Schedule for the North-East Frontier (Asom) Tribal and Excluded Areas. Q. Constitution of District Councils in all autonomous districts of Asom. R. Sixth Schedule for the North-East Frontier (Asom) Tribal and Excluded Areas. S. Demarcation of territories in North-East India. Select the correct answer using the codes given below
explanation: Sub-committee headed by Gopinath Bordoloi was appointed by the constituent Assembly of India to recommend the future pattern of administration of the North Eastern Frontiers Areas.
